comments:
On the latest code if you attempt to debug in a non-java project:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Launch configuration ExternalEntity 
82415.xml references non-existing project ExternalEntity.

Fixed in AntJRETab to set the ATTR_SOURCE_PATH_PROVIDER for all Ant launch 
configurations so that the AntClasspathProvider is used for source lookup.
